content.rendered:
ALL YOU NEED IS LOVE

BUT A NEW PAIR OF SHOES NEVER HURT ANYBODY

We've all heard that when you give a girl the right shoes, she can conquer the world. In honor of Tuesday Shoesday, we're rounding up some of our favorite bridal footwear.

From cute cowboy boots to bedazzled sneakers to sky-high stilettos, we've seen it all. We love to see brides embracing their true identity with a special pair of shoes for their own special day.

Scroll on to get inspired for your own wedding or just to see some pretty, shiny things to get you through the week!

1. Comfy-cozy

Photography: Stephanie Sorenson, Christopher Ramos, Rebecca Renee, John Myers Photography, Rachel Moore, Shots by Cheyenne, & DC Events & Design.

2. Sky High

Photography: Lauren Galloway, Rachel Moore, Rafferty Photo,  SheHeWe Photography, Frame Visuals, Sarah Sidwell, Molly Peach Photography & Erin McCall.

3. Something Blue

Photography: SheHeWe Photography, Kristin Vanzant, 30 Miles West, Blue Vinyl Photography, & Laura K. Allen Photography & Design.

4. Boots

Photography: Taylor N. Photography, Teale Photography, Stephanie Sorenson, & Rebecca Renee.

excerpt.rendered: A compilation of our favorite bridal shoes for #TuesdayShoesday.
